description: George III straight-sided oval teapot and stand; monogrammed; with wood handle and finial
inscription:
Marks; Inscription

Both pot and stand are engraved with the monogram [JAB] in script in Scottish style.
markings:
Marks; Inscription

Teapot fully marked on base; lion passant inside cover; the underside also stamped [SILVER * LYON           FOSTER* LANE].  Stand fully marked on underside.
title: Teapot and Stand
